name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Krispy Kreme locations are giving out free donuts this Halloween when you come in wearing a costume. Yeah, it’s the perfect way to kick off the "Holiday Diabetes Season."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: There was a big Halloween Party at the White House yesterday. Some of the Halloween costumes at the White House were a little over the top. For example, Melania Trump went as "Happily Married Woman."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: A recent poll came out that shows the approval rating for President Donald Trump has fallen to a historical all-time low of 33 percent. In response, Trump said, "You hear that? Historic! I’m in the history books! I did it!"

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Today is Game 6 of the World Series. Based on previous games, this one is expected to last two full days.
